description: Free and user-friendly PDF creator with many functions.

installer.script: Invoke-ExternalCommand msiexec -ArgumentList @('/i', "$dir\setup.msi_", 'DESKTOPICONS=No', '/qn', '/norestart') -RunAs -ContinueExitCodes @{ 3010 = 'A system reboot is required to finalize the installation.' } | Out-Null

uninstaller.script: Invoke-ExternalCommand msiexec -ArgumentList @('/x', "{D985C50D-6716-4F5D-9405-8ABF8055C1DE}", '/qn', '/norestart') -RunAs -ContinueExitCodes @{ 3010 = 'A system reboot is required to finalize the uninstallation.' } | Out-Null
